Class Platonic

java.lang.Object
  anar.Parametric
      anar.Obj
          anar.Platonic
All Implemented Interfaces:
iTransformable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Sphere
public class Platonic
extends Obj

Basic Primitives based on Platonic solids. Types: 

 TETRAHEDRON  = 0;
 OCTAHEDRON   = 1;
 DODECAHEDRON = 2;
 ICOSAHEDRON  = 3;
 SOCCER       = 4;
 SPHERE       = 5;
 GEODESIC_1   = 6;
 GEODESIC_2   = 7;

Constructor Detail

Platonic

public Platonic(int type)
Init a platonic of type. use Platonic.NAMES to get different primitive. By default, the object have a radius of 100. 
   TETRAHEDRON  = 0;
  OCTAHEDRON   = 1;
  int DODECAHEDRON = 2;
  ICOSAHEDRON  = 3;
  SOCCER       = 4;
  SPHERE       = 5;
  GEODESIC_1   = 6;
  GEODESIC_2   = 7;
